item.title: Foundations of Hip Hop: The Memphis Underground
item.author: Avish Vijayaraghavan,
item.description: Memphis hip hop emerged from the underbelly of Memphis, Tennessee in the early 90s. While the genre was distinctly underground, it has pervaded through decades of hip hop that followed. Characterised by dark lo-fi production, triplet flows, and repetitive hooks, the subject matter consisted mainly â€¦
